element.outerHTML: <button data-testid="jp-preview-btn" aria-label="Plan Your Journey" class="sc-db83366f-7 ccFsfx"></button>

<input type="text" id="jp-origin" name="jp_origin" data-testid="input-jp-origin" placeholder="Station name or code" autocomplete="off" role="combobox" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" aria-expanded="true" aria-autocomplete="list" class="sc-907d34c8-2 gcUsTN" value="Cambridge" autofocus="" aria-controls="sp-jp-origin-results-list" aria-activedescendant="sp-jp-origin-result-0">
element.label: Departing from

element.outerHTML: <input type="text" id="jp-destination" name="jp_destination" data-testid="input-jp-destination" placeholder="Station name or code" autocomplete="off" role="combobox" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" aria-expanded="false" aria-autocomplete="list" class="sc-907d34c8-2 hibVSI" value="" aria-describedby="iconlabel-label-jp-destination-tooltip">
element.label: Going to

element.outerHTML: <input id="radio-jp-ticket-type-single" name="jp-ticket-type" type="radio" data-testid="radio-jp-ticket-type-single" aria-required="true" class="sc-619f4b33-4 kXdgga" value="single" checked="">
element.label: Single

element.outerHTML: <input type="text" id="leaving-date" name="leaving_date" data-testid="input-leaving-date" maxlength="17" autocomplete="off" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" inputmode="none" class="sc-907d34c8-2 jcCXAy" value="12 Apr 2025">
element.label: Choose leaving date

element.outerHTML: <select data-testid="dropdown-select-leaving-type" id="leaving-type" name="leaving-type" aria-invalid="false" aria-required="true" class="sc-e9939e2c-3 bVUdYC"><option data-testid="dropdown-option-0-leaving-type" value="departing">Departing after</option><option data-testid="dropdown-option-1-leaving-type" value="arriving">Arriving by</option><option data-testid="dropdown-option-2-leaving-type" value="first">First train</option><option data-testid="dropdown-option-3-leaving-type" value="last">Last train</option></select>
element.label: Choose leaving departure option
